long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Love dogs and want to make your day better?
This extension will show you a dog every-time you open a new tab!
 
Features:

- Display a dog every new tab.
- Show the current date and time.
- Change the time between 12 hour and 24 hours clock.
- Display the most visited sites for easy access.

Upcoming Features:

- Ability to choose dog breeds, and only see those breeds.
- Display current weather.

Things to note:

This extension requires an internet connection to work. The images of the dogs are loaded by using Unsplash, and it needs internet to load the image url.
